name: Plane Simulator (GabrielPP) (GabrielPP)
description:
Flight over Helsinki, Finland terrain! There's still a lot to do in the game, add buildings, add sounds, animations, etc, but the game already is playable! Soon it'll be added the multiplayer mode and if I get the money buildings will be added, and the map will be very larger

Donate me, if you are able to, so I can add buildings to the "mini world" of the game, and even more, I can add the whole world!
